content: mushroom chilli & pine cone lights yarn less than one 25g ball of the following yarn the shade i suggest is written in italic but you can substitute with a similar weight yarn if you wish yarnsub com is a good site for help with that yarn a mushroom stem tiny amount 4-ply or light dk weight in beige or off-white i used cardiff cashmere classic shade 670 pois which is a dk weight yarn yarn b mushroom cap underside tiny amount 2-pyl 3-ply or 4-ply weight in brown or off-white or the colour of your choice i used cashmere classic shade 670 pois which is a super-fine yarn yarn c mushroom capt op tiny amount 2-ply 3-ply or 4-ply weight in brown or beige or the colour of your choice i used isagar alpaca 1 shade e8s which is a 2-ply weight yarn yarn d pine cone tiny amount dk weight in grey-green/ sage colour i used lana grossa landlust sommerseide shade 05 grey-green yarn e pine cone tiny amount silver thread yarn i used drops glitter yarn f pine cone stalk tiny amount dk weight in brown i used drops merino shade 06 taupe yarn g chilli tiny amount 4-ply weight in red i used cardiff cashmere classic shade 514 hermes yarn h chilli stem tiny amount 4-ply/ dk weight in green i used drops alpaca shade 7238 green grass mix knitting needles mushroom and chilli pair size 2 25mm pine cone pair size 3 00mm gauge 13 row x 10 stitches over 2 5cm/ 1in with 2 25mm/ us size 1 knitting needles and yarn a extras *led round ball balloon lights either warm or white light glue to stick plastic to yarn pin or sewing needle *to make the initial hole in the balloon light s stopper yarn sewing needle *or a string of led fairy lights suppliers balloon lights similar from here - amazon drops yarn and cardiff yarn from knittedhome com © claire garland © dot pebbles knits general abbreviations k = knit p = purl increase = increase decrease = decrease k2tog/ k3tog = knit two together/ knit three together p2tog/ p3tog = purl two together/ purl three together rh/lh = right hand/ left hand rs/ws = right side/ wrong side st/ sts =stitch/ stitches skpo = slip one stitch knit next stitch pass slipped stitch over knit stitch to decrease by one stitch kfb = knit into front then into back of stitch to increase by one stitch pfb = purl into front then knit into back of stitch to increase by one stitch rev yo = reversed yarn over bring working yarn from back of work and over the knitting needle in your right hand to the front before working the next stitch on the left-hand needle mushroom lantern page 4 mushroom lantern page 5 mushroom beginning at the top of the stem with yarn a cast on 3 sts leaving a long tail end this is important as it s
